lead_paragraph: CLUB In Spain, Deportivo Alavés, a club run by the mercurial American Dimitry Piterman, hired Fabri González as the club’s third coach of the season. Alavés, which was relegated from the top-flight La Liga last season, plays Barcelona today in a Round of 16 match in the King’s Cup. Last year Piterman bought a franchise, the San Francisco-based California Victory, that will begin play this season in the United Soccer Leagues First Division.
